entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Cornwall
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:17 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Saint-Anicet 9:00 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023
Temperature: -0.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 98 %
Wind Chill: -3
Dewpoint: -0.7°C
Wind: NE 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow mixed with freezing rain. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with freezing rain and rain. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h near midnight. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 7:36 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h in the afternoon then light late in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 8 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 7:36 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Cloudy. Low minus 7.
